page.title: 11NORTH BADDESLEY
page.content: {North Baddesley}was first mentioned in the Domesday Book in 1085 when it was only a village with 50 people and lots of fields and trees . But now it has 8,000 people and lots of houses, flats etc. One of the flats is{Gainsbough Court North Baddesleys old peoples home which is run by their warden. The main land cover is houses but some of it is small undeveloped grassy areas where children play after school. North Baddesley has two schools, one infant and one junior. The{Baddesley Arms}(which is one of North Baddesleys public houses) 0nce had a common behind it but now the land is covered by houses and shops. One of the things that North Baddesley is well known for is{Bordens chemical {works}which employs many people in and around North Baddesley .
